import React from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; export default function UserRequest({currentUser}) { const [isGenderSelections, setIsGenderSelections] = useState(false); const [selectedGender, setSelectedGender] = useState(currentUser.gender ? currentUser.gender : 'select'); const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(currentUser.first_name ? currentUser.first_name : ''); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(currentUser.last_name ? currentUser.last_name : ''); const [email, setEmail] = useState(currentUser.email ? currentUser.email : ''); const [age, setAge] = useState(currentUser.age ? currentUser.age : ''); const [addtionalInfo, setAddionalInfo] = useState({ date_of_birth: '', height: '', weight: '', about: '', motivation: '' }) function handleGenderSelections() { setIsGenderSelections(genderSelections => !genderSelections); } function handleSelection(e) { setIsGenderSelections(false); setSelectedGender(e.target.textContent); } function handleInput(e) { const name = e.target.name; let value = e.target.value; setAddionalInfo({ ...addtionalInfo, [name]: value, }) } return (
